name: coingecko-get-historical-data
description: Retrieves historical price, market-cap, and volume data for a coin over a date range (from_date to to_date).
author: Shinkai

api_key.description: CoinGecko API key for pro endpoints. If omitted, uses free public API with rate limits

id.description: Unique CoinGecko identifier for the coin (e.g., 'bitcoin', 'ethereum'). Must be valid ID

vs_currency.description: Target currency for price data (e.g., 'usd', 'btc'). Must be supported by CoinGecko

from_date.description: Start date in YYYY-MM-DD format. Must be earlier than to_date

to_date.description: End date in YYYY-MM-DD format. Must not be in the future

interval.description: Data granularity: '5m' (5 minutes), 'hourly', or 'daily'. Pro API required for 5m. Default: daily

from_date.description: Actual start date used for data retrieval in YYYY-MM-DD format

to_date.description: Actual end date used for data retrieval in YYYY-MM-DD format

interval.description: Time interval between data points ('5m', 'hourly', or 'daily')

prices.description: Array of [timestamp, price] pairs. Timestamp in milliseconds, price in vs_currency

market_caps.description: Array of [timestamp, market_cap] pairs. Market cap in vs_currency

total_volumes.description: Array of [timestamp, volume] pairs. Trading volume in vs_currency
